summary: In 1920, Inge, a German national, travels from Norway to rural Minnesota for her arranged marriage to Olaf, a Norwegian farmer; bureaucracy and prejudice cause major complications.
cast: Elizabeth Reaser|Lois Smith|Patrick Heusinger|Stephen Pelinski|Tim Guinee|Robert Hogan|Alan Cumming|Paul Sand|Jodie Markell|Sage Kermes|Kirsten Frantzich|Stephen Yoakam|Karen Landry|James Cada|Debbie DeLisi|Charlotta Mohlin|Tom Gilroy|James Bakkom|John Heard|John Paul Gamoke|Ned Beatty|Barbara Kingsley|Stephen D'Ambrose|Alex Kingston|Patrick Coyle|Raye Birk|Dick Reignier|Palmer Grinager|Tony Papenfuss|Wayne A. Evenson|Jamie Brockhohn|Jim Brockhohn|Jimmy Brockhohn|Joseph Courtemanche|Frank Crandell|Christopher Day|Joel Edwards|Matthew Feeney|Corbin Groothuis|Maximilian Selim|Joel Thingvall|Ken Vierling|Will Weaver|Jim Westcott
title: Sweet Land
